item.title: Fire Danger Ratings for Western Australia
item.description:
Content:

The following alert has been issued by the Department of Fire and Emergency Services (DFES).

Time of issue: 04:36 AM
Date of issue: 03 January 2023

Extreme Fire Danger Ratings have been forecast for the following Fire Weather Districts for 3 January 2023:

  • Midwest Coast
  • Midwest Inland
  • Lesueur
  • Yarra Yarra
  • Swan Inland North

High Fire Danger Ratings have been forecast for the following Fire Weather Districts for 3 January 2023:

  • Central Pilbara
  • Burrup
  • Ashburton Coast
  • Exmouth Gulf Coast
  • North Interior
  • Gascoyne Coast
  • Yalgar
  • North Goldfields
  • South Goldfields
  • West Interior
  • Central Interior
  • South Interior
  • Eucla
  • Swan Coastal North
  • Swan Coastal South
  • Swan Inland South
  • Geographe
  • Capes
  • Brockman
  • Blackwood
  • Southern Forests
  • Mortlock
  • Karroun
  • Avon
  • Lockwood
  • Arthur
  • Roe
  • Lakes
  • Stirling North
  • Stirling West
  • Esperance Inland


You can find the four-day Fire Danger Rating forecast, which Local Government Authorities are affected and relevant community safety messages on Emergency WA

END
Media Contact: DFES Media and Corporate Communications on 9395 9543.

item.title: Fire Danger Ratings for Western Australia
item.description:
Content:

The following alert has been issued by the Department of Fire and Emergency Services (DFES).

Time of issue: 04:11 PM
Date of issue: 31 December 2022

Extreme Fire Danger Ratings have been forecast for the following Fire Weather Districts for 1 January 2023:

  • Burrup

High Fire Danger Ratings have been forecast for the following Fire Weather Districts for 1 January 2023:
